name: FuexcUnidyLogin

infos.name: Unidy Single Sign-on Integration
infos.description:
Achtung: Diese App funktioniert nur in Verbindung mit einem kostenpflichtigen Account auf https://unidy.de/

Mit der Unidy Integration für Shopware 6 binden Sie unkompliziert und schnell Ihren Onlineshop an Unidy an. Mithilfe dieser Integration schaffen Sie Ihren Kunden die Möglichkeit, ihre Konten an allen Kontaktpunkten mit ihrer Marke miteinander zu verbinden und Adressen zu synchronisieren. Erleichtern Sie Ihren Kunden den Zugang zu Ihrem Shop, indem Sie dank Unidy die Anzahl der Accounts reduzieren und zentralisieren. Egal ob Gastbestellungen, Unidy als zusätzliche Option oder als alleinige Lösung: Sie Entscheiden selbst über die Zugangsmöglichkeiten Ihrer Kunden.
infos.installationManual: Nach der Installation muss in den Plugin Einstellungen nur die Domain Ihrer Unidy Instanz, sowie Zugangsdaten, die Sie von Unidy erhalten, eingetragen werden. Sie können nun mit wenigen Checkboxen konfigurieren, wie das Verhalten für den Nutzer im Shop sein soll, und schon geht es los!
infos.shortDescription: Unidy Single Sign On Integration in Ihren Shopware 6 Shop. Mit nur wenigen Klicks ermöglichen Sie Ihren Kunden sich mit einem Account an allen Kontaktpunkten Ihrer Marke einzuloggen.
infos.highlights:
Nahtlose Anbindung von Shopware 6 an die Unidy Account- und SSO-Lösung
Ermöglichen Sie Ihren Kunden einen einfachen Login mittels Unidy SSO
Wählen Sie selbst, welche Bestellwege Ihr Kunde hat: Gastbestellungen, Shopware 6-Konto oder Unidy. Sie entscheiden flexibel.
Schließen Sie die Adressdaten Ihrer Kunden an die Unidy Kontoverwaltung an
Integrieren Sie Shopware 6 nahtlos in Ihr Unidy-Ökosystem
infos.features:
Einfache und flexible Konfiguration
Variable Synchronisierungsrichtlinien
Erschließung von SSO-Anbindung an Shopware 6
Unidy Adresspflege direkt aus dem Onlineshop heraus

infos.name: Unidy Single Sign-on integration
infos.description:
Attention: This App only works with a paid account from https://unidy.de/

With the Unidy integration for Shopware 6 your online shop will be connected to your Unidy account within seconds. The integration allows your Customers to use a single Account for login to all touchpoints of your brand and sync theire address across all services. Provide a simpler access to your shop with a centralized account handling. You can decide if guest orders should still be allowed and if Unidy extends the users login options or is the single solution to be used.
infos.installationManual: After the installation, in the plugin settings you only need to enter the domain of your Unidy instance, as well as access data that you receive from Unidy. You can now configure with a few checkboxes how the behavior should be for the user in the store, and off you go!
infos.shortDescription: Unidy Single Sign-on integration in your Shopware 6 Shop. Only a few clicks are necessary to allow your customers to use a single Account for all touchpoints of your brand.
infos.highlights:
Seamless connection of Shopware 6 to the Unidy account and SSO solution
Allow your customers to easily login using Unidy SSO
Choose which ordering channels your customer has: Guest orders, Shopware 6 account or Unidy. You decide flexibly.
Connect your customers' address data to Unidy account management
Integrate Shopware 6 seamlessly with your Unidy ecosystem
infos.features:
Simple and flexible configuration
Variable synchronization policies
Unidy address maintenance directly from the online store

changelog.text: Adds support for Shopware 6.5
Bug fix for users synchronized to Unidy who have umlauts in the domain of their email address.
Bugfix: Resolves an error which has been thrown in the Shopware API if a customer address has been changed directly.
Hotfix: prevents the login of inactive customers

Allows for a custom password change url to be set for the change password link in the user profile.

Removes an unwanted space in the user menu for not logged in customers if no unidy login button is shown.
Adds multiple template blocks to allow for easier overriding in custom themes.

Bug fix: Unidy ids will now be saved in the customer profile even if no data synchronisation with unidy is set

Bug fix: The event to manipulate profile data changes on login is now correctly called
Optimization: Awareness of the address sync setting when updating the user data on login through Unidy
Bugfix that users were redirected to Unidy login after logout
Bugfix for starting the Oauth flow when already having an active shopware session
Adds more events to the login flow to allow for custom extensions to fit your processes.
Bug fixing the change passwort button in the customers profile

Allows to log the user out of Unidy when logging out of Shopware

Optimizes the user matching on the users first login through Unidy to match already existing accounts

Fixes a bug when creating new Unidy Accounts if the user has registered on a sales channel which is not the default one

Adds a link to change the unidy account passwort in the shopware account page

Adding. awareness of the customers sales channel when creating a new unidy account

Bug fix when redirecting the user after logging in to Shopware through Unidy
Fixes an error for referer redirects after login which could not be parsed as routes.

Removed unused configuration option

Only syncs active customer accounts to Unidy

Added a default value for the sync addresses setting

Added option to hide the login button

Allows for syncing new users in Shopware directly to Unidy if they meat criterias defined in a rule builder rule.

Adds multiple events to allow for overriding behaviour in a custom app.
Bug fix: Add missing Unidy login button when using as addition to hte normal Shopware Login
The path the user is on before logging in will now be saved and restored after logging in to provide a more seamless experience.
Add webhook support to always have the most recent state of the user address from Unidy in your Shop.
Release for the Shopware Store
